/opt/intel/bin/icpc  -fPIC   -g   -shared -Wl,-soname,libIExternalSurfaceOperator.so -o ../../plugins/operators/libIExternalSurfaceOperator.so CMakeFiles/IExternalSurfaceOperator.dir/ExternalSurfacePluginInfo.C.o  -L/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit/manta/2540/linux-x86_64_icc/lib  -L/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit2.8.1/src/lib/.  -L/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit/qt/4.8.3/linux-x86_64_icc/lib  -L/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit2.8.1/src/lib ../../lib/libvisitcommon.so -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit/manta/2540/linux-x86_64_icc/lib:/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit2.8.1/src/lib/.:/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit/qt/4.8.3/linux-x86_64_icc/lib:/export/ahota/visit/visitOSPRay/visit2.8.1/src/lib:
